mapper.insert: insert into DayLine ( stockId, volume, open, high, close, low, chg, percent, turnrate, ma5, ma10, ma20, ma30, dif, dea, macd, lot_volume, timestamp, time) values (#{stockId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{volume,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{open,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{high,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{close,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{low,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{chg,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{percent,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{turnrate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{ma5,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{ma10,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{ma20,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{ma30,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{dif,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{dea,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{macd,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lot_volume,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{timestamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
